did.unittitle: John Skutel Collection

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: Bridgeport History Center, Bridgeport Public Library

did.abstract: Collected by John Skutel, a private collector who placed his materials up for auction in 1989. The collection contains material related to P.T. Barnum and associates, which is heavily represented by the Bridgeport History Center's P.T. Barnum Research Collection (BHC-MSS 00001). Of note in the Skutel Collection is the original contract that signed M. Lavinia Warren to P.T. Barnum's management, and the original typescript of Warren's autobiography.

bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: John Skutel was a private collector of material related to P.T. Barnum.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: John Skutel collected material related to P.T. Barnum and his performers. While there are some items of Jenny Lind and Charles S. Stratton, also known as General Tom Thumb, in the materials, M. Lavinia Warren is the most heavily represented. There is no overarching scope beyond all of the connections to Barnum. Included in the collection are a number of mass market books, including multiple copies of Struggles and Triumphs, P.T. Barnum's autobiography.
